instructions: Score each criterion 1 if the analysis includes the specified element, otherwise 0. Total = sum of scores.

criteria.desc: Mentions and distinguishes {VARIABLE_U} A and {VARIABLE_U} B
Reports the coefficient of {VARIABLE_X2} on {VARIABLE_Y} for {VARIABLE_U} A and its significance
Reports the coefficient of {VARIABLE_X2} on {VARIABLE_Y} for {VARIABLE_U} B and its significance
Compares the magnitude of the {VARIABLE_X2} effect between {VARIABLE_U} A and {VARIABLE_U} B
Summarizes the overall conclusion about the effect of {VARIABLE_X2} on {VARIABLE_Y} between {VARIABLE_U} A and {VARIABLE_U} B
keywords: effect of {VARIABLE_X2} on {VARIABLE_Y} is larger in {VARIABLE_U} A
effect of {VARIABLE_X2} on {VARIABLE_Y} is smaller in {VARIABLE_U} B
effect of {VARIABLE_X2} on {VARIABLE_Y} is different between {VARIABLE_U} A and {VARIABLE_U} B
